Material used.Description: Experiments conducted using HEK293 and HEK293T cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: PARKIN variant c.136T>G reduced ubiquitination activity by 60% compared to wild-type.
LRRK2 variant c.136T>G showed 40% reduced kinase activity compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% relative to control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% relative to control.

Material used.Description: Immunoprecipitation experiments conducted using HEK293T cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: PARKIN variant c.136T>G showed 70% reduced interaction with ubiquitin ligase complex.
LRRK2 variant c.136T>G exhibited 50% reduced interaction with Rab proteins.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein interaction greater than 60% relative to control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein interaction less than 30% relative to control.
